text: Marc-Philippe Daubresse (born 1 August 1953) was the French Minister for Youth and Active Solidarities.Les EchosJournal du Dimanche ==Early life and education== Daubresse was born on 1 August 1953 in Lille, Nord.Assemblee NationaleLe Point He is a graduate of the École centrale de Lille, the Institut Industriel du Nord, and the Institut d'Administration des Entreprises.Portrait He was a member of Jeunesse Etudiante Chrétienne. ==Career== In 1974, Daubresse worked as staff member for telecommunications Minister Norbert Segard. He also served as regional chair of the Union pour la Démocratie Française, and later the Union pour un Mouvement Populaire for the Nord. From 1980 to 1983, Daubresse worked for Bouygues. From 1986 to 1992, Daubresse was a member of the regional council of Nord-Pas-de-Calais. From January 2001 to March 2008, he was the Vice-President of the Urban Community of Lille Métropole. Since 2003, he has been the President of the Conseil National de l’Habitat, then the Agence Nationale de l'Habitat. From March to November 2004, Daubresse was Secretary for housing, and from November 2004 to May 2005, he was Deputy Minister for housing and cities. Daubresse has been the mayor of Lambersart since 1988. ==Political positions== In the Republicans’ 2016 presidential primaries, Daubresse endorsed Nicolas Sarkozy as the party's candidate for the office of President of France.Ludovic Vigogne (April 20, 2016), Bataillons: Primaire à droite: la liste des premiers soutiens parlementaires L'Opinion. ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:People from Lille Category:French Christians Category:Union for French Democracy politicians Category:The Republicans (France) politicians Category:Modern and Humanist France Category:Government ministers of France Category:Mayors of places in Hauts-de-France Category:École centrale de Lille alumni Category:Lille University of Science and Technology alumni Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Senators of Nord (French department)
